alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ransom, southwestern Cass and southern Barnes Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Valley City, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Litchville, Fingal, Nome, Hastings, Kathryn, Lucca and Little Yellowstone. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 277 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
